charities.label: Red Cross
charities.description: Australian Red Cross is there for people in need, no matter who you are, no matter where you live.

charities.label: Salvation Army
charities.description: The Salvation Army helps provide hope, opportunity and freedom to all Australians without discrimination.

charities.label: Glenn McGrath Foundation
charities.description: The McGrath Foundation raises money to place Breast Care Nurses in communities across Australia and increase breast awareness
